name: E73:DDNNA
description:
E73: DDNNA. Episode 73: Devils Don't Need No Advocates.

A short made in less than 24 hours.

Rough around the edges - not pretty, not polished. 

Unfinished but most importantly existing.

The limited expressions of living life post-traumatic event.

Being one's own devil's advocate - for someone undeserving of having one.

And trying to overcome that struggle.

(Content warning: Implied abuse/ harassment/ assault.)

CONTROLS:

WASD to Move.

Space to Jump.

E/ LMB to Close Text.

ESC to Exit.

(Don't fall.)

(Content warning: Implied abuse/ harassment/ assault.)
